meanings: annihilation, total[complete] destruction, 섬멸하다 annihilate, destroy totally, wipe out, stamp out

examples.korean: escalate a conventional war into an annihilating atomic war 듣기 Add to Wordbook 보통 전쟁을 섬멸적인 핵전쟁으로 확대시키다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: escalate a conventional war into an annihilating atomic war Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The army annihilated the enemy soldiers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 군대는 적군들을 섬멸했다. Neungyule
examples.english: The army annihilated the enemy soldiers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We wiped out the enemy fleet in short order. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 적의 함대를 한순간에 섬멸했다 Neungyule

examples.korean: They exterminated the Japanese forces. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 일본군을 섬멸했다 Neungyule
examples.english: They exterminated the Japanese forces. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Your mind will be utterly annihilated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신들의 마음은 완전히 섬멸당할 것이다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 남윤경(skad****)
